es.internal

Class ThinkCycleExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.internal.ThinkCycleExecutor

  • class ThinkCycleExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    Executes a single think cycle in the ES.

    • Method Detail

      • thinkCycle

        java.util.Set<Predicate> thinkCycle()
        Makes the ES think for a single cycle.

        Output predicates of activated rules are replaced if they contain variable arguments e.g. &x

        Returns:
        the activated Predicates as a result of thinking

      • factsContains

        private boolean factsContains(Fact inputFact,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Argument> pendingReplacementPairs)
        Checks if a particular fact getMatchResult with any other fact in the ES. If inputFact contains a variable argument, matching pair placed in pendingReplacementPairs
        Parameters:
        inputFact - fact contained in a Rule
        pendingReplacementPairs - the pending replacement pairs
        Returns:
        true if (at least) two facts match

      • activateRulesAndReplaceVariableArguments

        private java.util.Set<Predicate> activateRulesAndReplaceVariableArguments(java.util.Set<Rule> pendingActivatedRules,
                                                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Argument> pendingReplacementPairs)
        Activates the Rules specified by the given pending activated Rules and pending replacement pairs.
        Parameters:
        pendingActivatedRules - the pending Rules to activate
        pendingReplacementPairs - the pending argument pairs to replace variable arguments with
        Returns:
        the set of Predicates activated

      • addPredicate

        private boolean addPredicate(Predicate predicate)
        Adds a Predicate to the ES. Will cast the tag to either a Rule, a Fact.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the Predicate to be added
        Returns:
        true if the Predicate is successfully added
